segments.text: If we employ you , what starting salary would you expect ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to start at 3000 yuan a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think your background and experience are worth the compensation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there are annual bonuses , one week paid vacation a year , and health insurance .
segments.speaker: S1
